content.rendered:
A selection of delicious premium, organic wellness teas delivered direct to your door each month for only $23. That's only 75c a day to discover new and exciting teas each month. 

Choose from either a one-off delivery or a year’s subscription delivered monthly, bi-monthly or quarterly.

Please leave us a message when checking out if you have a preference for black, green or herbal teas and we will try to include more of these teas as larger boxes in your subscription boxes. For our one-off subscription boxes, if you have a tea preference for the larger box please message us, otherwise we will select a box for you.

Future renewals can be cancelled at any time by contacting us on info@bodhiorganictea.com

Bodhi tea subscriptions make a special gift for your tea loving friends. It’s the thoughtful gift that keeps on giving.
